rooms.description: Serves as entry foyer with natural lighting and Vastu compliant positioning.
Spacious open-plan living area connected to the kitchen, featuring large windows for ventilation and solar gain, with a seating arrangement that respects Vastu guidelines.
Eco-friendly, energy-efficient kitchen integrated into the living area, with ample storage and natural lighting. Materials include sustainable flooring and low VOC paints.
Dedicated home office placed in a quiet corner with east facing window for optimal light and concentration according to Vastu principles.
Master bedroom designed for comfort and relaxation with south-east orientation for good energy flow.
Secondary bedroom in the north-west portion ensuring proper sunlight and ventilation.
Third bedroom with privacy and efficient use of space, following Vastu guidelines for bedrooms.
Functional bathroom attached to the master bedroom for convenience; includes eco-friendly fixtures.

openings.description: Main entrance door with energy-efficient design and Vastu compliant positioning.
Multiple windows throughout the floor, ensuring natural light and ventilation as per local building norms and eco-friendly practices.
Balcony providing an outdoor space with greenery and a view of the courtyard.
